FuncDef: This command specifies the MEP from which to debug the CFM PDUs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maintenance association endpoint identifier of the launch point. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the maintenance domain (MD) index value of the launch point. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the maintenance association (MA) index value of the launch point. Values-1 to 4294967295.
